ansible_deployment.Role¶

class ansible_deployment.Role(role_directory)¶

Represents an ansible role.

Parameters

role_directory (str) – Path to role directory.

path¶

Path object.

Type

Path

name¶

Role name extracted from path.

Type

str

defaults¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

vars¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

tasks¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

files¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

handlers¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

templates¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

meta¶

sub directory file information with parsed yaml data.

Type

dict

Notes

The attributes containing role sub directory information are ‘None’ if the corresponding sub directory does not exist.

copy_to(destination_path)¶

Copies the source role directory to a given destination.

Parameters

destination_path (str) – destination path

symlink_to(destination_path)¶

Symlinks the source role directory to a given destination.

Parameters

destination_path (str) – destination path
